name: Deep Dive (Payal Chana)
description:
Deep Dive is a vertical scrolling, stealth game where the player controls a light, using it to see the environment more, but that also causes enemies to chase after you.

This was an experimental game we created to play around with the idea of a torch/light mechanic, constantly falling down, traps and enemies chasing after you.

We wanted to play around with a persistent-falling mechanic while trying to play around with a light mechanic to sneak around.

This was created with the help of Luyolo Mbatha and Cameron St. Clair. 

Thank you for working on this with me!
